channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Elio Abi Younes

item.title: Displacement, Deprivation, and Hard Work among Syrian Refugee Children in Lebanon
item.description: abstract: Background The protracted Syrian war resulted in the largest refugee crisis of our time. The most vulnerable are children who face separation from parents, interruption of schooling and child labour. This study explores the living and working conditions of Syrian children in Lebanon. Methods In this cross-sectional study, we randomly selected 153 informal tented settlements and conducted interviewer-administered surveys among Syrian refugee working children in the Bekaa Valley in Lebanon.
